entities.name: barn owl
entities.description: A barn owl brought Neville a small package from his grandmother.

entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville was excitedly opening the package and showed them a glass ball.

entities.name: remembrall
entities.description: A Remembrall is an object that tells you if there's something you've forgotten to do.

entities.name: gran
entities.description: Neville's grandmother sent him a package with the Remembrall.

entities.name: draco malfoy
entities.description: Draco Malfoy snatched the Remembrall out of Neville's hand.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry jumped to his feet when Draco Malfoy took the Remembrall.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron jumped to his feet when Draco Malfoy took the Remembrall.

entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall quickly intervened in the situation.

relationships.description: Gran sent Neville a package with the Remembrall.
Draco Malfoy snatched the Remembrall out of Neville's hand.
Harry jumped to his feet when Draco Malfoy took the Remembrall from Neville.
Ron jumped to his feet when Draco Malfoy took the Remembrall from Neville.
Professor McGonagall quickly intervened in the situation.
